title: reference_info
description: An object describing reference sample and related data used for relative BRDF measurements.

name.title: name
name.description: Name of the instrument or system that was used for the measurement of BRDF data presented within the file.

model.title: model
model.description: Model of the instrument or system that was used for the measurement of BRDF data presented within the file (if applicable).

manufacturer.title: manufacturer
manufacturer.description: Field for providing manufacturer of the instrument or system used for BRDF measurements as a text (i.e.string).

type.title: type
type.description: Type of the optical sensor used in BRDF measurement set-up as text (i.e. string). For example "photodiod", "CCD-camera", "photomultiplyer" etc.

material.title: material
material.description: Light sensing material used in optical sensor included in BRDF measurement set-up as text (i.e. string). For example "Si", "InGaAs" etc.

shape.title: shape
shape.description: Shape of the photosensitive area of optical sensor included in BRDF measurement set-up as text (i.e. string). For example "Si", "InGaAs" etc.

dimensions.title: dimensions
dimensions.description: Dimensions of the photosensitive part of the sensor included in BRDF measurement set-up. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

solid_angle.title: solid_angel
solid_angle.description: An object describing detection system's viewing solid angle in steradians. It is an object with keys "value" and "unit".

value.title: value
value.description: Numerical value of the detection system's viewing solid angle as a number.

unit.title: unit
unit.description: Unit of the detection system's viewing solid angle as a string that can have values "sr".

data_links.title: data_links
data_links.description: An array that allows to refer to available external technical information regarding setup or instrumentation used for BRDF measurements. Array of URL links as a text (i.e.string).

comments.title: comments
comments.description: The field for providing in a text/string form any additional information relevant to instrumentation used for BRDF measurement.

adhoc_section.title: adhoc_section
adhoc_section.description: An object that contains user defined keys (not available in "instrumentation" object) describing any information relevant to the instrumentation used for BRDF measurement. Adhoc section can contain all types of entries.
